project_descr: The overall objective of the project is to contribute to early recovery, resilience and social cohesion of targeted local communities. The project also contributes to prevention of terrorism, violence and radicalisation.

outputs.output_descr: In this output, 3x6 approach plans to be implemented. Beneficiaries will be engaged in Cash for work with cross-cutting theme training to get revenue injection and have vocational training
In the output, youth centres will be rehabilitated and equipped to organise sessions on non-violence, religious tolerance and community dialogue.
Current and potential tensions over natural resources such as water, wood and land among IDPs, refugees, returnees and local communities could lead to crucial conflicts in the future.

project_title: community empowerment and peace building in the north
